DOC.brief_summary: The study has three objectives: 1. To determine if the device can detect if middle ear fluid is present in children who are scheduled for tube placement (myringotomy) 2. If fluid is present to characterize the fluid as thick or thin 3. Evaluate the safety of the device
DOC.brief_title: Device Study to Evaluate the Detection and Characterization of Middle Ear Fluid in Children
DOC.criteria: 6 months to 17 years scheduled to undergo myringotomy procedure mastoiditis tympanostomy tubes chronic middle ear disease otitis externa perforations of the middle ear use of antibiotic ear drops within 2 days of surgery systemic antibiotic use
